name: Jon Burton

last_movies.title: Lego Star Wars: The Complete Saga
乐高蝙蝠侠大电影：DC英雄集结

introduction: Jonathan Philip "Jon" Burton (born 1969) is a British video game director, designer, writer, and executive. He is the founder of development studio Traveller's Tales and its parent company TT Games.Burton founded Traveller's Tales in 1989. He worked as a designer on Puggsy and the Lego Star Wars series.[1] He has received five British Academy of Film and Television Arts awards.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jon_Burton
